verses.verse: Moreover the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, Take<WH3947> thee a great<WH1419> roll,<WH1549> and write<WH3789> in<WH5921> it with a man's<WH582> pen<WH2747> concerning Maher-shalal-hash-baz.<WH4122>
And I took unto me faithful<WH539> witnesses<WH5707> to record,<WH5749> <WH853> Uriah<WH223> the priest,<WH3548> and Zechariah<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Jeberechiah.<WH3000>

And I went<WH7126> unto<WH413> the prophetess;<WH5031> and she conceived,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> a son.<WH1121> Then said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> to<WH413> me, Call<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Maher-shalal-hash-baz.<WH4122>

For <WH3588> before<WH2962> the child<WH5288> shall have knowledge<WH3045> to cry,<WH7121> My father,<WH1> and my mother,<WH517> <WH853> the riches<WH2428> of Damascus<WH1834> and the spoil<WH7998> of Samaria<WH8111> shall be taken away<WH5375> before<WH6440> the king<WH4428> of Assyria.<WH804>
The LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> also unto<WH413> me again,<WH3254> saying,<WH559>

Forasmuch <WH3282> <WH3588> as this<WH2088> people<WH5971> refuseth<WH3988> <WH853> the waters<WH4325> of Shiloah<WH7975> that go<WH1980> softly,<WH328> and rejoice in<WH4885> <WH853> Rezin<WH7526> and Remaliah's<WH7425> son;<WH1121>

Now therefore,<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> the Lord<WH136> bringeth up<WH5927> upon<WH5921> them<WH853> the waters<WH4325> of the river,<WH5104> strong<WH6099> and many,<WH7227> even<WH853> the king<WH4428> of Assyria,<WH804> and all<WH3605> his glory:<WH3519> and he shall come up<WH5927> over<WH5921> all<WH3605> his channels,<WH650> and go<WH1980> over<WH5921> all<WH3605> his banks: <WH1415>

And he shall pass<WH2498> through Judah;<WH3063> he shall overflow<WH7857> and go over,<WH5674> he shall reach<WH5060> even to<WH5704> the neck;<WH6677> and the stretching out<WH4298> of his wings<WH3671> shall fill<WH4393> the breadth<WH7341> of thy land,<WH776> O Immanuel.<WH6005>

Associate <WH7489> yourselves, O ye people,<WH5971> and ye shall be broken<WH2844> in pieces; and give ear,<WH238> all<WH3605> ye of far<WH4801> countries:<WH776> gird yourselves,<WH247> and ye shall be broken<WH2844> in pieces; gird yourselves,<WH247> and ye shall be broken<WH2844> in pieces.
Take counsel together<WH5779> <WH6098> and it shall come to naught;<WH6565> speak<WH1696> the word,<WH1697> and it shall not<WH3808> stand:<WH6965> for<WH3588> God<WH410> is with us.<WH5973>

For <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH559> thus<WH3541> to<WH413> me with a strong<WH2393> hand,<WH3027> and instructed<WH3256> me that I should not walk<WH4480> <WH1980> in the way<WH1870> of this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559>

Say <WH559> ye not,<WH3808> A confederacy,<WH7195> to all<WH3605> them to whom<WH834> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> A confederacy;<WH7195> neither<WH3808> fear<WH3372> ye their fear,<WH4172> nor<WH3808> be afraid.<WH6206>
Sanctify <WH6942> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> himself; and let him<WH1931> be your fear,<WH4172> and let him<WH1931> be your dread.<WH6206>

And he shall be<WH1961> for a sanctuary;<WH4720> but for a stone<WH68> of stumbling<WH5063> and for a rock<WH6697> of offense<WH4383> to both<WH8147> the houses<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> for a gin<WH6341> and for a snare<WH4170> to the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>
And many<WH7227> among them shall stumble,<WH3782> and fall,<WH5307> and be broken,<WH7665> and be snared,<WH3369> and be taken.<WH3920>
Bind up<WH6887> the testimony,<WH8584> seal<WH2856> the law<WH8451> among my disciples.<WH3928>
And I will wait<WH2442> upon the LORD,<WH3068> that hideth<WH5641> his face<WH6440> from the house<WH4480> <WH1004> of Jacob,<WH3290> and I will look<WH6960> for him.

Behold, <WH2009> I<WH595> and the children<WH3206> whom<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath given<WH5414> me are for signs<WH226> and for wonders<WH4159> in Israel<WH3478> from<WH4480> <WH5973> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> which dwelleth<WH7931> in mount<WH2022> Zion.<WH6726>

And when<WH3588> they shall say<WH559> unto<WH413> you, Seek<WH1875> unto<WH413> them that have familiar spirits,<WH178> and unto<WH413> wizards<WH3049> that peep,<WH6850> and that mutter:<WH1897> should not<WH3808> a people<WH5971> seek<WH1875> unto<WH413> their God?<WH430> for<WH1157> the living<WH2416> to<WH413> the dead?<WH4191>
To the law<WH8451> and to the testimony:<WH8584> if<WH518> they speak<WH559> not<WH3808> according to this<WH2088> word,<WH1697> it is because<WH834> there is no<WH369> light<WH7837> in them.

And they shall pass<WH5674> through it, hard pressed<WH7185> and hungry:<WH745> and it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that when<WH3588> they shall be hungry,<WH7456> they shall fret themselves,<WH7107> and curse<WH7043> their king<WH4428> and their God,<WH430> and look<WH6437> upward.<WH4605>

And they shall look<WH5027> unto<WH413> the earth;<WH776> and behold<WH2009> trouble<WH6869> and darkness,<WH2825> dimness<WH4588> of anguish;<WH6695> and they shall be driven<WH5080> to darkness.<WH653>
